data.title: New & Used Commercial Trucks for Sale
data.meta_description: Check out our huge inventory of New and Used Boom Trucks, Bucket Trucks, Service Trucks, Diggers, Trailers, and Construction Equipment in Lynchburg, VA.
data.text:
ABOUT | Forest, VA

Located in the Blue Ridge Mountains’ foothills along the James River banks, Lynchburg is known as the “City of Seven Hills.” Did you know that Lynchburg was the only major city in Virginia that the Union did not recapture by the end of the American Civil War? Custom Truck One Source Lynchburg is located off Highway 460. Our facility sits on a 28-acre campus that includes a 42,000 sq. ft. assembly plant, a 40,000 square foot fabrication facility, a repair shop, and five massive paint booths. Our branch is the leading assembler of aerial lift trucks for the forestry industry and can upfit all Class 7 Chassis. Our customer base includes independent tree trimmers to the larger production tree companies. Our campus stays stocked with chassis and lifts, which means we can deliver the products within weeks.

View Forest Inventory
